name: Jump Jump Zombie!
description:
Arrive at a goal so as not to fall in a hole!
Zombie can jump 3 times at once.
All 360 stages! （3 kinds of degree of difficulty!）

Zombie lover must play this game!

■ How to play
When a tap does a screen, a zombie jumps!
Falling in a hole, the game is over.

■ The sound material
*maou damashii and noda kobo
